text: Vigil is a 1984 New Zealand drama movie directed by first time director Vincent Ward and starring Penelope Stewart, Frank Whitten, Bill Kerr, Fiona Kay, Gordon Shields. ==Other websites== * * Vigil at Vincent Ward Films * Vigil on NZ On Screen Category:1984 drama movies Category:New Zealand drama movies Category:Movies directed by Vincent Ward Category:Movies set in New Zealand
title: Vigil (movie)
